pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video presents a couple of scenery shots of the bustling St. Mark's Square in Venice, Italy, on a sunny day. The footage captures the iconic architecture of St. Mark's Basilica and the Doge's Palace, with crowds of tourists milling about. Souvenir stands are also visible in the lively and historic European plaza.
